attributes.action: confer Presidential status on Phil Woodford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom needs a President. Royalty and Democracy have served these islands well and will continue to do so. But sometimes we need that lone individual. 

Someone to cut through the spin, to know what the voters really want - in short someone who will take those tough decisions.

Step forward Phil Woodford.

Phil is the King of Words, the Master of the Media. He even admits to liking The Dooleys, Love Patrol! 

His web site even says ‘oddball’! 

www.philwoodford.com

He’s been involved in politics at the highest level – OK, unsuccessful parliamentary candidate. But he knows how to walk the corridors of power and how to push past all those little cliques and the political wannabees.

Single-minded, focused. Call it what you will.

Phil won't let us down.

Vote for Phil.

PS He's a jolly nice guy as well.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
